label: Theme engines
description: Used by GTK themes to draw widgets.

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root aptitude -y install gtk2-engines-ubuntulooks gtk2-engines-oxygen gtk2-engines-nodoka gtk2-engines-moblin gtk2-engines-magicchicken  gtk2-engines-cleanice gtk2-engines-aurora

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root run-as-root aptitude -y install gtk2-engines-ubuntulooks gtk2-engines-oxygen gtk2-engines-nodoka gtk2-engines-moblin gtk2-engines-magicchicken  gtk2-engines-cleanice gtk2-engines-aurora

status.command: dpkg-query -l install gtk2-engines-ubuntulooks gtk2-engines-oxygen gtk2-engines-nodoka gtk2-engines-moblin gtk2-engines-magicchicken  gtk2-engines-cleanice gtk2-engines-aurora
